title: Lee Men's Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jean
description: RELAXED FIT: This jean has a comfortable fit that is more relaxed through the seat and thigh than our Regular Fit jean. It sits at the waist & fits straight through the leg. The traditional 5-pocket styled men's jean is available in a variety of finishes.

STYLISH DESIGNS: Lee's full line of men's shorts, men's jeans, men's khakis, men's jackets and more provide you with a stylish wardrobe all year round. With cargo shorts for summer hiking trips and denim jackets for windy fall days, Lee keeps you going.

QUALITY OVER QUANTITY: For over 100 years, Lee has been making quality, dependable denim. We'd rather sell one quality garment than 100 inferior ones. If you're looking for quality jeans, shorts, jackets, skirts, overalls, belts or uniforms, look to Lee.

99% Cotton/1% Spandex; Imported; Zipper closure; Machine Wash; Straight-leg jean with relaxed fit featuring five-pocket styling and signature label at back waistband; Zip fly with button; Bottom opening: 17"; It sits at the waist and fits straight through the leg. Plain back pocket styling

TRUSTED QUALITY: The quality craftsmanship and design of Lee jeans will keep your whole family looking great. Lee jeans, shirts, khakis, skirts and more make great gifts for teens, gifts for women, gifts for men, or gifts for kids!

Just like our founder,  H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.
